授業目的: The purpose of this course is for students to learn business fundamentals using English through situational practice, evaluation of information, and creation of new ideas.
到達目標:
Students will be able to …
• Remember and understand main ideas and details from readings and video content through summaries, discussions, and connections
• Synthesize information and concepts to create new ideas through charts, diagrams, videos, and inventions
• Analyze and evaluate information and data providing comparisons, explanations, inferences, critiques, and recommendations using discourse markers and business vocabulary
• Communicate through the understanding and use of gestures, eye contact and tone of voice while applying business concepts and vocabulary
特記事項:
本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。
The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業の概要・背景:
• Learn about the fundamentals of Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) and business
• Discuss case studies and apply critical thinking skills
• Evaluate a problem at work and propose a solution
• Evaluate a company’s CSR efforts and propose a marketing plan
• Deliver multimedia presentation(s) using business English
• Create a professional business (marketing) plan
• Create a professional, interesting video describing product or service benefits
授業方法: This course will use a variety of learning activities ranging from lectures, discussions, presentations, pair work, and group work. Classes are conducted face-to-face in the classroom. The online class participants will receive online simultaneous interactive delivery during class time.
